Package filesprocessing.Sorts

Class SortStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • filesprocessing.Sorts.SortStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParametersFormat, java.util.Comparator<java.io.File>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SortAbsolute, SortSize, SortType
    public abstract class SortStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Comparator<java.io.File>, ParametersFormat
    Abstract class for the different Sorting strategies. Every sort strategy has a switch of REVERSE. The class implements the Interfaces: ParametersFormat - to be able to handle the format if needed. Comparator - implements a compare method.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected static int EQUALS
      This value represents an equal comparison result.
      protected static int FILE1
      This value holds if file1 should be returned from comparator.
      protected static int FILE2
      This value holds if file2 should be returned from comparator.
      protected static int REVERSE_OFF
      This value holds for reverse OFF in this sort.
      protected static int REVERSE_ON
      This value holds for reverse ON in this sort.
      protected int reverseSwitch
      This switch tells if the sorting is reversed or not. 1 : means the sort is no reversed

      • Fields inherited from interface filesprocessing.Sorts.ParametersFormat

        REVERSE, SEPARATOR

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SortStrategy​(boolean reverse)
      The constructor get a boolean value to tell if the reversed order is ON.

      • reverseSwitch

        protected int reverseSwitch
        This switch tells if the sorting is reversed or not. 1 : means the sort is no reversed. -1 : means the sort is in reverse order.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SortStrategy

        public SortStrategy​(boolean reverse)
        The constructor get a boolean value to tell if the reversed order is ON. If it is, initialize the reverseSwitch member to -1. otherwise, to 1.
        Parameters:
        reverse - a boolean value tells if this sort strategy sorts in reversed order.
